content: in 2022 there was a divorce case between mr and mrs they had a marriage contract but it was never ratified or amended they provided a detailed statement of their property debts and agreements they agreed on the division of their property custody of their children and financial arrangements they chose the dutchspeaking family court in brussels for their case the ability party declared bankruptcy and filed for judicial reorganization they also requested collective debt settlement the parties agreed on a domicile for service and the notary confirmed their identities an authentic instrument was created to enforce their declarations the parties received a draft of the instrument and had five days to execute the final deed the notary informed them of their rights and any conflicts of interest the parties accepted the clauses in the document the notary collected a fee for the duty documents the original deed will be kept by the notary for 50 years the parties can access a free online version of the deed the notary will provide an official copy upon request the process is completed and amendments to the organic law notarial profession were acknowledged and signed by the parties involved
